content: Hi, I am relatively new to building implementation guides and am porting the IG project we build last year with DSTU3 to 4.0.0. I have specified in ig.xml fhirVersion 4.0.0 and in the ig.json "\'"specification": "http://hl7.org/fhir"'. I am not sure if these are correct. The build seems to go well. However, I have hundreds and hundreds of errors like this one: "The link 'http://hl7.org/fhir/' for "FHIR Version: 4.0.0" cannot be resolved" -- please let me know what I should do to correct this?

"specification": "http://build.fhir.org" for current build

"specification": "http://hl7.org/fhir/R4" for FHIR R4 Home
